org.opensocial.services.myspace
Class StatusMoodsService

java.lang.Object
  org.opensocial.services.Service
      org.opensocial.services.myspace.StatusMoodsService

public class StatusMoodsService
extends Service

OpenSocial API class for MySpace status and mood requests; contains static methods for fetching and updating MySpace statuses and for fetching supported moods and mood history.

Author:
Jason Cooper

Constructor Detail

StatusMoodsService

public StatusMoodsService()
Method Detail

getStatus

public static Request getStatus()
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the current viewer's status and mood and makes this data available as a StatusMood object. Equivalent to getStatus("@me").

Returns:
new Request object to fetch the current viewer's status/mood
See Also:
StatusMood

getStatus

public static Request getStatus(java.lang.String guid)
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the specified user's status and mood and makes this data available as a StatusMood object.

Parameters:
guid - OpenSocial ID of the user whose status is to be fetched
Returns:
new Request object to fetch the specified user's status/mood
See Also:
StatusMood

getFriendStatuses

public static Request getFriendStatuses(java.lang.String guid)
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the status and mood of all of the specified user's friends and makes this data available as a List of StatusMood objects. Pass "@me" to fetch the statuses and moods for all friends of the current viewer.

Parameters:
guid - OpenSocial ID of the user whose friends' statuses and moods are to be fetched
Returns:
new Request object to fetch the specified user's friends' statuses/moods
See Also:
StatusMood

getStatusHistory

public static Request getStatusHistory()
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the current viewer's previous statuses and moods and makes this data available as a List of StatusMood objects.

Returns:
new Request object to fetch the current viewer's previous statuses/moods
See Also:
StatusMood

getFriendStatusHistories

public static Request getFriendStatusHistories()
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the previous statuses and moods for all of the current viewer's friends and makes this data available as a List of StatusMood objects.

Returns:
new Request object to fetch the current viewer's friends' previous statuses/moods
See Also:
StatusMood

getFriendStatusHistory

public static Request getFriendStatusHistory(java.lang.String friendId)
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the previous statuses and moods for the specified friend and makes this data available as a List of StatusMood objects.

Parameters:
friendId - OpenSocial ID of the current viewer's friend whose previous statuses/moods are to be fetched
Returns:
new Request object to fetch the specified friend's previous statuses/moods
See Also:
StatusMood

getSupportedMoods

public static Request getSupportedMoods()
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches all moods supported by and available on MySpace and makes this data available as a List of StatusMood objects.

Returns:
new Request object to fetch all available MySpace moods
See Also:
StatusMood

getSupportedMood

public static Request getSupportedMood(long moodId)
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, fetches the specified mood and makes this data available as a StatusMood object.

Parameters:
moodId - ID of mood to fetch
Returns:
new Request object to fetch the specified mood
See Also:
StatusMood

updateStatus

public static Request updateStatus(StatusMood statusMood)
Returns a new Request instance which, when submitted, updates the current viewer's status and/or mood.

Parameters:
statusMood - StatusMood object specifying the status and/or mood parameters to pass into the request; typically, status and moodId are set
Returns:
new Request object to update the current viewer's status and/or mood
